Producer: Michael Elliott, Lee Groombridge, Louise Palmkvist
Production Co: BFI Films, BBC Film, EMU Films
Synopsis: Talented, ambitious, and backstabbing hairstylists gather for a competition in England, only to find one of their own murdered before judging can begin. Winding through neon-lit halls and backstage dressing rooms, competitors unspool long-simmering resentments and secrets as they search for the killer among them, in this devilishly funny whodunit from debut filmmaker Thomas Hardiman.
Title: Medusa Deluxe
